content: leave a long start- but you cannot claim the pattern as your round 12 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 8 own i politely ask that you credit me ing tail chain 9 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook heather jarmusz as the designer of this sts repeat from * around 30 sts and each across 8 sts pattern and that you include a link to my round 13 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 9 etsy shop if you sell your items online row 1 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across you can even copy/paste this text for sts repeat from * around 33 sts 8 sts f/o weave in ends this and other crochet patterns please round 14 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 10 visit www hamandeggs etsy com using bright blue yarn embroider the word sts repeat from * around 36 sts kiss on the face on the wrapper using start- thank you so much for respecting my rnds 15-17 single_crochet in each st around 36 sts ing tail sew to top of hershey s kiss weave work and copyright in ends f/o weave in ends add 6-mm eyes in between if you have any questions please feel free rounds 10-11 6 sts apart using black yarn to email me at heatherjarmusz@yahoo com embroider small smile use photo as a guide thank you so much for your purchase © copyright 2013 heather jarmusz all rights reserved enjoy patterns designed by heather jarmusz for ham and eggs
